hero_title: Uncover what makes videos go viral.
hero_subtitle: Track trends, analyze comments, and predict growth. Discover viral sparks in just 3 seconds.
tool_description:
What is VizzTube?
A YouTube-focused research tool that instantly reveals why videos are going viral. Comment analysis, trend extraction, and growth forecasting—all in one.

features.desc1:
See exactly why a video is going viral.
Quickly identify what’s trending.
Automatically extract hot videos based on categories and keywords. Check views, likes, comments, and more at a glance—greatly reducing research time.
features.desc2:
“The comment section is the best marketing data.”
Understand viewers’ true thoughts with AI.
Analyze any video’s comments to visualize viewer demographics, emotions, and interests. Clearly see what your target audience reacts to.
features.desc3:
“Spot future viral videos before they’re popular.”
Predict the next viral hit.
Automatically extract attention-worthy videos that are gaining views rapidly based on metrics like views, post date, and subscriber count. Filter by view/subscriber ratio and more.
